website_summaries.verdict: This large hopper ball has a generous maximum weight capacity, making it a solid option for big kids, teenagers, and adults.
pros: Large diameter and a weight capacity of up to 300 lbs
is ideal for big kids or the young at heart
Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
Easy to inflate with the included hand pump
Robust enough to withstand some abuse

customer_reviews.title: Hop hop hop!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so I could join my young children in hopper races around the house. I'm 5'9," 150-ish pounds, and athletic and trying to keep up with my kiddos on a hopper ball is HARD!! It also holds my 200-ish pound husband just fine. You can get some serious air on these hopper balls, which was an AWESOME surprise! They're also multipurpose, so you can do ab workouts as well on them. My only complaint is that the handle rubs on my inner thighs and creates minor discomfort. This may be related to user error (when I'm frantically trying to hop faster than my kiddos, hahahaha). I wish I would have found out about adult hopper balls sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Adult Jumping Ball! Youth had a blast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for youth camp and they worked very well. I had teenagers on them outside all day of all sizes and they held up with no popping. They are great quality. I had ordered this kind and another to compare to a more expensive one and this one was just as good as the more expensive ones. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting kids moving!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old grandson who needs more exercise! He loves it. So far he's only been able to use it inside because of rainy, cold weather but he is in non stop motion! On the second day the directions say to fill the ball with more air. When we did this the ball was then to large for him so today I ordered the smaller size. With prime we will get it tomorrow! He can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough for a goat
customer_reviews.text: Tough ball. 1 year later and my 280 pound goat buck is still knocking it around and has yet to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and large
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a different hopper ball that did not even last 24 hours. This one is a great large size and can withstand everything my 9 year-old son does to it. It is still going strong since Dec. 2015. Great for letting kids get some energy out inside when weather is bad. So far it has only been used indoors and in the garage. Will update later about how it holds up outside
customer_reviews.author: CarrieSoVery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Proprioceptive/Vestibular Input!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old is autistic and this ball is AWESOME for him! He can self regulate by bouncing, sitting, or laying on the ball. But we also use it for "steamrollers" to squish him with the ball and our full body weight on the ball. It's incredibly effective therapy for him and he actually asks for it. Also speaks well to the durability because we REALLY crunch down on him! As a bonus, I use this ball to do crunches on when he's not using it;)
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Held up great even though they've been outside for 8 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these blue ones and a red "bull" one for a tween kids birthday party. They had a blast! We used it on the turf in the yard and due to my laziness, the blue ones have lived outside since (almost 8 months). Mind you, I live in the Mojave desert! We try to keep them under shade, but the wind often moves then to the sun. The red bull one we took inside recently to use as "alternative seating" (see picture) since we distance learn Monday through Friday now! These have all held up great so far! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds up!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" and the 28" ball works for me! I'm chubby and it holds my weight just fine. Been bouncing around the house for days. Took a few minutes to inflate with the small hand pump, nothing excessive. I'm going to buy one for my husband too.
customer_reviews.author: TaraCada

customer_reviews.title: No size consistency
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 identical balls in the same size. When I blew them up. They were 2 different sizes. I paid for 2 adult balls and it appears I received an adult and kid ball. Packaging both said adult. Unfortunately I recycled the boxes before I knew I was sent a defective ball. Now I’m stuck with a child sized ball while paying the adult price. Do not order from here.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! We bought the teenager size I believe for my very tall 7 year old and it’s so big I myself a grown woman could hop on it lol. In fact I did to show my 7 yr old how to hop on it right. I dont know the weight limit but it seems like it’ll last. Our youngest has one of those unicorn ride on hopper things and my oldest wanted one but she was just way to tall so this is what she got from “Santa” and so far a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Cory G

customer_reviews.title: Old-school fun for kids and adults up to 300 pounds!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift for a 10-year-old boy. He had never seen one before. Once I explained to him what it was and inflated it, he loved it. Even though we told him no bouncing in the house, it was cold and rainy, so- just this once. It is supposed to hold 300 pounds, so all the adults thought it would be fun to take turns riding it, too. Even his 215-pound father bounced all around the house on it and had a great laugh. Hopefully when the weather improves, they can all play outside. 😆 I’m thinking of buying one for his parents, too.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Popped after 2 days-even on a soft surface
customer_reviews.text: This popped after just two days of small children bouncing on a soft surface with it. It is large and it was fun but it's not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: RCTID

customer_reviews.title: Works well; as describe/expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people complain about the residue. It clearly says to wash off the shipping residue prior to using in the accompanying directions. We did, and the ball is just fine with no residue. Sturdy ball that the kids love. You can fill it a lot or not so much depending on their size. My 8 y.o. can fit this ball under inflated, and an adult can fit this ball fully inflated. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Diva Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm..
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gag gift for wife 130 lbs. She never had one as a kid. Description says up to 300 lbs. It looks like a standard ball-no bigger? This was suppose to be for adult. To be truthful she has bounced around house a few times. Not sure rubber will really hold up in yard. Im 150 lbs and I almost squished it? If this is for a child, should be fun! They just dont make them like they use too. Nice price for a gag gift though.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Item is sold as 70cm and it says it is 70cm on the box, but is in fact listed as 65cm on the item. So it is smaller than advertised. I'm not even sure it is that big. I got tired of blowing it up, so it might not be fully inflated, so when I measured it, it wasn't even 65cm. I think it is a little too small for an adult, but my 12 and under kids are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Perfect for older kids
customer_reviews.text: We used it for a whole afternoon and it worked perfectly! Perfect size for kids between 8- 12 year old! Look very durable I’ll update in a month 😉
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Not really made for bigger people to properly bounce on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my son and i. My son is big for 10yrs old. I found that that you can sit on them and bounce but it is very difficult to bounce and move. I think they are to squishy to bounce and move. It seems that the rubber is to thin. So while they are very durable we were no able to bounce while moving. My son was very disappointed and so was i. It feels like a ball that's not fully inflated when you sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: deanna brown

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun and a great workout
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lot of fun. It seems really durable, bounces well and the handle makes it easy to hold onto. It’s too big for my son who I bought it for, but I had a great time on it 😆
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son with autism to use inside in a floor with rubber padding. Busted when bounced on it once. Return date had passed. Contacted customer service and they are sending one out without having me returning the original. VERY pleased with how this was handled. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly a great gift for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, bought for our youngest daughter and all the kids want to use it now... they seem to really love it, i was surprised honestly. Comes with a little hand pump that works well and is made of a thick material. They have been bouncing around since Christmas. Not my older daughter wants her own!
customer_reviews.author: GPNRanch

customer_reviews.title: Popped on second day
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this hopper for my sons 11th birthday. He was so excited! We pumped it up very easily and took it outside to try out. Since it was night we only spent about 15 mins bouncing. The next day he took it outside to bounce and within in minutes it popped. We combed the yard for anything that could have punctured it and found nothing. I can only conclude it was a manufacturer's defect or poorly made☹
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These adult bounce balls are very durable and thick and are a great fun bounce for all ages. Amazon is great and wi refund if something wrong with item or replace. I love Amazon and their workers help. Thi would reccomend this bounce hopper. My son is 5'6 and 165 lbs and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COVID-friendly indoor racing
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and exercise for people 5'4" and shorter. Causes sweat and laughter. We have 2 and do indoor hopper races. Nobody has gotten hurt yet. Occasionally, we use this for seating. Has to be kept indoors and inflated periodically after use. Simple easy-to-use hand air-pump.
customer_reviews.author: L. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: 1st Lasted less than 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: When we used this as a toy, it broke and popped immediately. My son bounced for hours and then it popped along the seam. I bought a replacement so he can use it for flexible seating during home school and it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: NYDelFL

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandchild and he loves it! He has spent many hours hopping around the house. Liked it so much we got another one for his sister so they can race! They are 9 & 13 and the 28 inch was perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeyMountainGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise when stuck home
customer_reviews.text: 11 year old son is 5'4 and 150lbs. He has been stuck inside with this pandemic and only gets out for an occassional bike ride. This ball is awesome. He is getting sweaty jumping all over the house. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: grl28

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the daily deals, and I bought it for my son on a whim. I cannot express how much fun this ball is! He used to love these when he was younger, but then he just got too big for them. This one is big enough for even the adults. My 11 year old has bounced all around the house on it, and he bounces as he watches his shows too. My 13 year old (who is 5'10) has also grabbed it and bounced all around. He loves that he can fit on it without a problem. This ball is such a blast. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KristenTag

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my 11 year old boy three months ago and it's still pretty good condition he bounces in it every day i have to mention he has only used indoors. It's does the job, I have used it for a couple of minutes and I am a bit heavy. I weight close to 180 lbs and it's hasn't blow up. Well it might Also depends on how much air you put on it.. I recommend not over do it. Happy with this purchase worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: This over sized bouncer is sturdier than expected. My kids, 2 of them 13 and one 8 year old have been having a blast bouncing on this outside in the grass. I'll probably pick up 2 more so they don't have to take turns.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I ordered for my 6 yr old who is the size of an 8 year old so I figured it would grow well with him. He loves the darn thing. Its super sturdy and looks just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Riah

customer_reviews.title: Fun bouncing ball for adults
customer_reviews.text: The size and durability work well for all adults in the family. Easy to inflate although it's big and takes some time to reach it's maximum size. A fun game, exercise, and seating option indoor.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: All grandkids loved these balls and it is good core exercise
customer_reviews.text: Out of 6 balls this is the only one that popped. All grandkids loved these balls and it is good core exercise. Drives mom and dad crazy when they bounce around the house but they love them ages from 5 to 16.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L. Lapell

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the whole family, brought back childhood memories- I played with a thicker version while in kindergarten- I’m 44 now and I love this thing- Update: still amazing - the grand baby likes to sit on it with me and bounce - best $ ive spent in a while
customer_reviews.author: Mary Turner

customer_reviews.title: Blown away by the quality!
customer_reviews.text: These Hopper balls are extremely sturdy and thick! They are perfect for my teenage client to hop around on and there’s no fear of it popping. I’d definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Parents be ware this jumping ball is very, very ...
customer_reviews.text: Parents be ware this jumping ball is very, very dangerous, today 06/22/18 6:30pm my 11 years daughter was jumping on it when all of the sudden this ball burst. She hurt her behind and was in a lot of pain . Time will tell if I have to look into legal action on this company who invented this ball !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great excercise for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 and loves these hopper balls. This is the second one this size I have bought. The only issue I am having with both of them is air is leaking but no hole.. we just pump it back up and its good until she is is done playing. She uses it a lot. The other smaller one doesn't get used so much and it hasn't lost any air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was incredible to see third graders who never used one of these get to experience the joy of bouncing
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for part of my school's yearly field day obstacle course. They were a BIG hit! It was incredible to see third graders who never used one of these get to experience the joy of bouncing. They held up well through out the entire day even under my XL adult body when i had to demonstrate how to use them to the students. They would have worked for teenagers or even adults. I liked the fact they came with a pump and extra plugs. You do have to keep on inflating them and they will get bigger, as I found out when one was noticeably smaller than the other until I kept pumping air into it.
customer_reviews.author: Kandee cakes

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and makes all other indoor sports more fun
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite gifts to give kids. I also get lots of these for the Foster Toy drives at Christmas because its such a great indoor activity. This size is good for age 12 on up (five foot or taller) so if you are giving these to a younger child, make sure to get a smaller size. My kids love not just bouncing on these but playing lots of games on them (try soccer and other games on a bouncy ball-it takes them all to a new level).
customer_reviews.author: Wiwse

customer_reviews.title: ... teenagers and adults in our household had tons of fun jumping with this ball
customer_reviews.text: The teenagers and adults in our household had tons of fun jumping with this ball. We only use these inside and haven't had one pop yet. (We've had them for almost a year now.) Santa gave this to my teenage daughter as kind of a joke. It ended up being one of the most enjoyed Christmas toys at our house. It helps big people feel like a kid. Pictures of adults playing on this with hair flying are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: FrugalMommy

customer_reviews.title: Good size, adult can use but recommend for age 10+
customer_reviews.text: Strong. Large ...but not dangerously so ...for a 10 year. She loves it. Easy to inflate. Still going strong ( last year’s purchase).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be able to hold an adult - they said up to even 300 pounds. Well, it is so small, there is no way to use it for an adult. I did as directed, waited and added more air, etc, but the truth is this thing is no where nearly the size of my exercise ball. If it were, that would be fantastic. As it is, I just have this blue ball and an air pump. I guess I'll save it for when little children may visit. A complete waste of money because it is no bigger than the child size ones you see in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie's Doodles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great size
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for an 11 year old boy. I expected it to break within minutes as he is very rough with things. It hasn't broken, despite him jumping off of things with it and very rough play. He weighs about 80 lbs. Its very large; I'm 5'6" and I fit on it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Akl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for heavier children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew who is a very solid child. He was able to use this without it being damaged and thats exactly why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jmp

customer_reviews.title: great gift for the boys
customer_reviews.text: children enjoyed being able to go outside and have a fun time on these hopper balls, have to make sure they stay in the grass
customer_reviews.author: P. DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to exercise
customer_reviews.text: If you're lazy and just want to sit all day, this is the thing for you. This thing can exercise your core, legs, and is great cardio. If you're a glandular 200 pound blob- like me- you can hop on this thing and just hop the calories off and have a load of fun while doing it. Just don't bounce it inside the house or EVERYTHING mounted on the walls will collapse off the hangers and shatter into a million pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my daughter love this product. Right now this bouncy ball just little to big. We bought 2 one little smaller wasnt sure which be good fit for my daughter. So pink one work better for her. We going save this in year she be ready for this one. Very well made and sturdy..
customer_reviews.author: DEEANNA&BRIAN CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: use reviews from real customers
customer_reviews.text: Woman said her goat had played with this ball for a year still ok. 2 Bostons had it for 2 days and it collapsed. One dog jumped on it and it tore. Not as heavy as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: How long will it last?
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren loved these balls, but they are soft and really flexible. Time will tell whether or not they last.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Longino

customer_reviews.title: This is the ball for adults or rough play
customer_reviews.text: Went through several of this type of ball with my boys on the trampoline. Some balls didn't last 5 minutes, but this one is different. Not only larger but much thicker as well. It did finally pop, but I feel like we got our moneys worth from it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: great bounce
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this ball, she has been on it almost every minute. She bounces a round the house and sits on it as she watches TV. The best gift of the year. And it will last many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C. Mc Larty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my talk on gaining balance in life
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect prop for my speech on gaining balance. It is not possible without some help. The handle was great when I had a friend hop around the room to gain attention and bring people back to the conference. The only problem was that my grand-kids confiscated it and now I have to order another one. They love it. Very good quality construction and sturdy. Glad it came with the pump. A good value and I will be ordering another one. Judy Helm Wright aka "Auntie Artichoke"
customer_reviews.author: Judy Helm Wright aka Auntie Artichoke

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for older children
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten two smaller balls for my 2 and 3 yr old grandkids and wanted to get my seven year old grandson one too. He weighs 110 lb so I knew the smaller one wouldn't be good for him so I found this bigger ball and he loves it too. So many times we have to tell him that he is too big for a certain toy but he can bounce along with his sister and cousin now. The air pump that comes with it is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson says this is his favorite Christmas gift this year. He loves it and him and his sister, who has one as well, race all over the house on these things. Good exercise too.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Keep your box
customer_reviews.text: When it came I was pleased it was similar to the one advertised. My son had a few bounces the day it arrived, and It popped. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MARI

customer_reviews.title: Received the WRONG SIZE for 2 out of 3 purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered THREE 28inch Space Hopper Balls and only one of the balls was the proper size. I am being told that I cannot return or replace the two items that were NOT WHAT I ORDERED because it is beyond the 30 day point. Unfortunately I purchased these as gifts and they were not opened until today so we were unaware of the smallest balls until we blew them up :( very very disappointing for two of the kids and frustrating for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: My kids and the kids at church love it. I bought 2 to play a game ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids and the kids at church love it. I bought 2 to play a game with and one of the Hoppers started leaking as soon as I started pumping it up. It came with a hole in it. I was extremely disappointed because we could not use it to play the game. I am not very confident in this company now.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hopper for older children
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific hopper ball. It is well made and easy to inflate with the hand pump. I bought this ball for my ten year old son, who constantly wanted to use a small hopper purchased for my four year old. Turns out that they both enjoy using it... my son hops on it and my daughter rolls over the top of it. It is a great toy to bring to kids' sporting events - gives the non-playing kid something to do on the sidelines.
customer_reviews.author: CT Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Oh boy! What did I buy!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love, but it gives me a heart attack (not really) every time they use them. Great buy so I thought but my kids freak me out with them. Even with them being 9 and 11. Wondering when they are going to pop and then be gone! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kaileiann Sherred

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what my sister thought it would be. Ordered for parent so she can teach 4yr old how to use theirs. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: While this is advertised for adults, I purchased it for my daughters, 9, 11, & 13. They absolutely love it. They are much to big for the small ones that are sold in the local stores. They have had an absolute blast bouncing around on this. It seems very durable. My dog has jumped up to it several times and we have had no issues with leaks. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent party balls to be used on lawns
customer_reviews.text: My sons and grandkids had bouncing ball races and ball wars. What fun, even Grandma joined in. I purchased 10 of the largest sizes for Christmas party fun!
customer_reviews.author: KonaGal

customer_reviews.title: BOOOOOOOO lame
customer_reviews.text: My son 4 yrs old and. 50 lbs. So I ordered a larger one. Pumping it took so long and for what? 5 min it lasted till it popped. And it wasn't even blown up all way
customer_reviews.author: Shy Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good for long legged 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: This size bounce and sit ball turned out to be good for a long legged 10 year old and also for a 12 year old and an adult or 2. It is very durable and fun to use. Comes with its own pump. Easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Blue Hopper Ball
customer_reviews.text: I bought three hopper balls - two kid size including the blue hopper ball, and an adult hopper ball. What great fun for parents and kids.
customer_reviews.author: NJK

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages including high school
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for a lock-in for my high school students. While they are a little challenging to blow up with the hand pump, the kids managed just fine and then they had an absolute blast using them all night! They are lovely because you can pull out the plug to deflate them to make storage easy and then reinflate again later. Again, these were highschooler's using them and we had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon regular

customer_reviews.title: Go exercising!
customer_reviews.text: It is good for exercising! You can play it with your kids! Family time and happy time!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got the 28in/70cm Diameter for Age 13+ for my almost 9 year old boy and it fit his size perfect. So I suggest you go big instead of small. My son uses the ball everyday to bounce around the house. he's not gentle with it and its still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: karine yaralyan

customer_reviews.title: Such a great toy for such a great price
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy for such a great price!!! I am going to buy many more of them just to keep in the closet for emergency gifts
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of my old hoppers hop
customer_reviews.text: I’m a tall girl and it worked fine for me. Takes up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Good Workout
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! We love it! Our kids think it's so fun that their parents want to bounce around like them on their little hoppers. It must also be good cardio because I am out of breath when we're all done.
customer_reviews.author: H. Family

customer_reviews.title: Best hopper!
customer_reviews.text: The best hopper ever!! Huge enough for me. I'm 5'2.5" and 150lbs. I bought this for my 7 yr old very tall daughter but I use it too. I have to let some air out for her. It's very durable!! No leaking!
customer_reviews.author: MyFun4

customer_reviews.title: It is larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is large enough for all our adult staff. We have fun with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Little Lotta

customer_reviews.title: Must have for virtual learning
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to bounce around of this as a break during his school zoom meetings. It’s great to have as a movement break and also indoor or outdoor exercise. Glad to have purchased this for him
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: I will say that I've used it as well and it supports me just fine - I weigh approximately 140 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old daughter loves this massive blue ball. Our 5 year old wants to play on it but it is too large for him. I will say that I've used it as well and it supports me just fine - I weigh approximately 140 lbs. It's lots of fun. We plan on getting a smaller one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome adult fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome adult fun. Even when the police showed up at the hotel at 1:30 in the morning, because of a noise complaint, as we were having bouncy ball races down the hallway.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl lucas

customer_reviews.title: We got a used one and nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I just took this out of the box to pump up for Christmas morning tomorrow and it's nothing like the picture, and used. Very disappointed. All blue, too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Richards

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! I bought 3 in different sizes for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I bought 3 in different sizes for my 3 kids ages 6-11. They laugh so hard while bouncing around the house. The 28 inch one is big enough for an adult. They have lasted a month so far with little to no wear and tear. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sommer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted One Week
customer_reviews.text: It said for ages 13 AND UP.... An 11 year old at my summer program who looks 12 or 13 bounced onit and it popped. Off to search for another brand. Or maybe I'll buy this again and juts inform you that it's not about AGE, it's about size.... No one over say 110lbs should be using this. Slightly heavier can use it, but they have to be survised to ensure they don't bounce to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: They need to make a bigger one, but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1" 225 lbs. I got this to bounce with my 2 year old. (Try to control your laughter) Your legs will get sore very fast, for my size I need a ball with about a 12" bigger diameter. It will bounce, though and won't bust, which given my weight is impressive. This would fit a 80 to 120 lb person much better and they could get much better height and distance too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Fun time with nana
customer_reviews.text: Use this with my grandson we hop all over the house
customer_reviews.author: LEANN

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: Gifts for a 13 year old and 19 year old. They are 5'6" and 5'10" - kids are having a blast! Seems thicker than a yoga ball - we have had several. More fun than a yoga ball too!
customer_reviews.author: H and S

customer_reviews.title: ... annual Extraordinary Race which combines the likes of The Amazing Race, Survivor
customer_reviews.text: We used this during our annual Extraordinary Race which combines the likes of The Amazing Race, Survivor, and a good old fashioned scavenger hunt. It performed great to 10+ adults bouncing around with the largest competitor being just over 200 pounds. Definitely is stronger than I thought it would be and I would recommend to anyone thinking about buying one but not sure if it will hold up!
customer_reviews.author: CCase

customer_reviews.title: Very Big, Very Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It is very large. too big for my 2 or 5 year old to ride on as intended, but they love playing with them and is seems to be holding up very well indoors and out for the last month and it does hold adults...so it's fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Meghamom

customer_reviews.title: We bought it a few weeks ago. So far we are all enjoying it and ball still alive
customer_reviews.text: We bought it a few weeks ago. So far we are all enjoying it and ball still alive :-) I'll update later.
customer_reviews.author: Entangled Э

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 year old boy and we all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mo&AbesMama

customer_reviews.title: Great hopper ball
customer_reviews.text: This hopper ball has been used daily indoors since Christmas by my 8 year old with no problems. Well, there is one problem I guess. It's hard to see the TV with my sons head bouncing up and down in front of it. But at least it is keeping him active even when he is watching television or playing video games.I bought two hopper balls from Xino sports and they both went flat the first day after only a short time of use indoors. This one, however, has stayed inflated. My son doesn't walk anymore, he bounces everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Keep on jumping!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a grandma and I needed one to keep up with my grandchildren. This size is the perfect size and I love it. We have so much fun jumping together.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I ordered 3 of them for our students and we've had a blast with them, even the adults bounce around on them. You can blow them up full sized or fill them up with less air for shorter bouncers.
customer_reviews.author: live the mission

customer_reviews.title: Such a blast!
customer_reviews.text: These are a BLAST. We got them for Christmas (all of us are adults, 20-35 in age) and we had so much fun. They held up really well, even outside in the summer. Highly recommend, cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Older kids and adults loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 10 balls for a school party and the kids absolutely loved them!! They were a hit with both parents and children. Some of the moms had even offered to buy them off me. The pump works as detailed however you will need some arm strength to get them pumped to the maximum capacity. Luckily my husband had an air compressor and filled them with air in less than 10 minutes. These will continue to service school parties for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 7 year old grandson and it’s the perfect size for him. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Monster

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful what you order! I originally ordered the normal one, as pictured on the left, then I ordered the exact same one (size, brand, etc.) again and it was significantly smaller! They should warn you, sizing is varied and order at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia P.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun and good exercise for adults. Children exercise when they play, but because something is fun, it doesn't feel like exercise. This allows grown-ups to play, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jacob

customer_reviews.title: funhop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hippity hop to attempt to regain some of my youth and get a little exercise. It's a lot of fun. This certainly provides plenty of exercise hopping around and definitely works well for my height. I am 5'2". I had originally purchased a 36" diameter ball for myself but that one was too big and I could barely get my short legs on it. This is a fun purchase, good for short adults.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ball, not the play ground rough kind
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball, not the play ground rough kind, smooth and adjustable up to adult size. My 9 year old loves it. Bounces everywhere and gets the wiggles out and works her core sitting on and playing with it. Best idea I had to buy my kids one!
customer_reviews.author: SewMarci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great gift for active kids stuck inside. Helps them actively but safely bounce off energy.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Hopper ball 28 i
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived crushed and looked like it was too small for the box. I bought this for my 10 year nephew and he loved it. It seemed to fit him well. He is tall for his size. It has been used indoors only. I do not think that it last long outside.
customer_reviews.author: 55HEL

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get the kids outside more great job adults can use it to
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the twins birthday got two of them they both love him
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this so much he jumps for hours! Holds up well and have had no issues even with cats in the house and plenty of obstacles (legos).
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this and use it all the time. They actually share it surprisingly. It is perfect for a small yard.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

product_meta.title: AppleRound Space Hopper Ball: 28in/70cm Diameter for Ages 13 and Up, Pump Included (Hop Ball, Kangaroo Bouncer, Hoppity Hop, Sit and Bounce, Jumping Ball)
feature_bullets: Blue clouds featured. Inflated size appr. 70cm/28in in diameter. Durable Grab n' grip handle. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use.
Age group 13 years and up. Maximum sustainable weight of 300 pounds or 135 kgs.
Includes a two-way hand pump. Ball is delivered deflated. Presented in color box and ideal as a gift.
Lab tested, durable and safe. Conforms to the toy safety requirements.

Inflation instruction: Take out the inserted white plug (air stopper) from the ball, insert the tip of the pump and inflate the ball to good size, and then replace the white plug back into the hole quickly. Bounce!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars945 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
